text: The page http://tomcat.apache.org/native-doc/ says to install Tomcat Native by editting setenv.bat or sentenv.sh. However, those scripts do not exist in the current 4.x builds, nor do any such scripts appear to be present in any later versions of Tomcat (5.x, 6.x).
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: By default, setenv does not exist. It should be created if required. I have added a note to that effect to the docs.
